For both Positive/ Negative Slope
eq(1) will change the gradient in the dirrection of minimum loss.

div.div:
Here ,
X = Input
Y = Ground Truth
A = Activation / Prediction
W = Weights
b = Bias
Z = W*X + b
E = Error

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
